CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(FSA_Closeout_Period__c, "No"), Effective_Date_of_FSA_Termination__c , ( IF(ISPICKVAL(FSA_Closeout_Period__c, "Yes - 30 days"), Effective_Date_of_FSA_Termination__c+ 30, (IF(ISPICKVAL(FSA_Closeout_Period__c, "Yes - 60 days"), Effective_Date_of_FSA_Termination__c+ 60, (IF(ISPICKVAL(FSA_Closeout_Period__c, "Yes - 90 days"), Effective_Date_of_FSA_Termination__c+ 90, Effective_Date_of_FSA_Termination__c))))))
)
CustomField.label: FSA Closeout Period End Date
